sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { RegisterUser } from '../services/User' const Register = () => { let navigate = useNavigate() const initialState = { firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' } const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormValues({ ...formValues, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await RegisterUser({ firstName: formValues.firstName, lastName: formValues.lastName, email: formValues.email, password: formValues.password }) setFormValues(initialState) navigate('/signIn') } return (
) } export default Register
